fungi.name: Purple Mushroom
fungi.description: A vibrantly colored, and possibly magical, mushroom.

fungi.name: Glowing Mushroom
fungi.description: A mushroom that emits a soft, natural light.

fungi.name: Morel
fungi.description: A highly prized and flavorful wild mushroom.

fungi.name: Red Mushroom
fungi.description: A type of fungus. Eating one unlocks the 'Who wants to go on a trip?' achievement. Using an Animation spell on a mushroom and capturing it as a pet unlocks the 'From Fungi to Familiar' achievement.

insects.name: Mealworms
insects.description: The larvae of the mealworm beetle.

insects.name: Beetles
insects.description: A group of insects with a hard exoskeleton.

insects.name: Insect Puree
insects.description: A paste made from ground insects.

oozes.name: Green Ooze
oozes.description: A slightly more complex, and possibly acidic, ooze.

oozes.name: Superior Ooze
oozes.description: An ooze of higher quality and potency.

exotic_dishes.name: Bugs n' Slime
exotic_dishes.description: A delightful combination of crunchy and gooey.

exotic_dishes.name: Bugs n' Ooze
exotic_dishes.description: A variation of the above, with ooze instead of slime.

exotic_dishes.name: Moss Wrap
exotic_dishes.description: Edible moss used as a wrap.

plants.name: Rare Glowing Moss
plants.description: A rare, glowing moss with magical properties.

plants.name: Moss
plants.description: A type of plant. Cooking with it in Mossy Glade is required for the 'Mossmade' achievement.

fungus.name: Truffle
fungus.description: A rare and expensive fungus prized for its unique aroma and flavor.
